note.p: Birth: Milford House, near Salisbury, Wiltshire, England (26 May 1781)
Death: 17 Devonshire Street, Portland Place, London (10 August 1859)
Career: Writer in the HEIC's factory, Canton (1798); introduced vaccination into China (1805); Chief of the factory, Canton (1816); returned to England and sat in Parliament (1818-)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1859-1860 vol 10 pp xxvi-xxix
